rules.|?|: start absolute value %1 end absolute value
rules.\\int_?^? ?: the definite integral on the interval from %1 to %2 of %3

rules.?>=?: %1 is greater than or equal to %2
rules.\\sqrt[?]{?}: root index %2 start root %1 end root
